original_title: エロ怖い怪談 第四之怪 呪幻
overview: An eerie patient, Shima, appears to Haruna, a psychiatrist. "I have a nightmare." Haruna murmured Shima with hypnosis, but since that day Haruna has been suffering from her sleep disorders. Is the fierce incident that comes one after another a dream? Is it a reality? What is Shima?
title: Ero Kowai Kaidan Vol 4: Curse
